title: Spectator Out Loud: Douglas Murray, Nyrola Elimä, Theo Hobson
description:
On this week's episode, we’ll hear from Douglas Murray on why he thinks that the Coronavirus is over. (00:51)

Next, Nyrola Elimä on her family’s experiences as Uighurs living under the rule of the CCP. (08:27)

And finally, Theo Hobson on why the different factions of the Church of England need to come together. (16:54)

Produced and presented by Sam Holmes
